title: thanavaari thanamu
sahitya:
tanavAri tanamu lEdA tArakAdhipAnana vAdA

anupallavi

 ina vamshA rAjulakI guNamu-lennaDaina galadA nAdupai

caraNam 1

 pEra pEra bilva hAralu prEma mIra mIrOsaga nAdupai
   
caraNam 2

 alanADu anna maragincu vELa balu vAnaralu pankti nunca lEdA
   
caraNam 3

 rAma rAma rAma racca sEyakavE tAmasambu Ela tyAgarAjanuta
